name: F.R.A..M..E...R...A....T....E....
description:
Use the left mouse button to create balls. The goal is to get your framerate consistently under 10 FPS. You have a variety of tools at your disposal to alter what happens with the balls you create. Do you have the Unity knowledge to understand how to tank your framerate?

Warning: this game will probably make your computer run slower. You have been warned.

There is no music. There is no sound. There is only the power of creation.

Created in ~1.5 hours in Unity 2021.2.15f1.

Full project available in my Low Effort Jam Github Repo
